name: Time Pressure!
description:
The clock is ticking and you have limited time to get to the key if you wish to unlock the next, even harder, challenge! Many will try, few will succeed... Which one will you be?  Time Pressure is a game made by one person. Your goal is to progress through harder and harder levels by touching the key scattered around the map.  Don't let the levels trick you. They might seem small but so is the time frame! The game will be getting content updates in the future
  • Fast Paced
  • Minimal requirements
  • Hard
Can you make it in time? Can you make it in one try? Post your link if you have completed the game in one try from start to finish! Every level can be passed. Some are really tricky!

Let me know if you want to work with me in future projects!

Feedback is highly appreciated so why don't you leave a comment?

Controls 
  • Movement : WASD /  Arrow Keys
  •  Jumping: W / Space  / Up Arrow key
  •  Restart: R
  • Exit to menu: Esc
  • Music Pause: P
  • Music Volume Up: =  /  + (Keypad)
  • Music Volume Down: - / - (Keypad)
You can find the same list of controls in game! Click on the "Keys" button while on the main menu
